name: The Insider's Club
overview: A strategy shareware game by Colin Edwards, released in 1990. This is a business game, deal with shares and make your fortune. The Insider's Club is a light-hearted game of yuppie capitalism. It s quite funny to Think you’re doing well, only to see that the computer opponent has bought half the companies in sight and has £50 million in the bank. That's life,.. We'll beat it one day.
